posts.author: NwnwhiteBoy
posts.content:
Okay, I started playing WoG because I was curious why so many of the best builders play on it.. I found out why, it is an amazing server!

As I was looking though the level 40 builds I found Demos' Last Rites I liked it but I wanted to have 8 APR and ED so I added monk and switched out some feats. After doing this in my head I though after half making it and finding I hit NE not LE like a retard I though I'd make it for you to rip to bits.

So this is the creation!

I know it has been done many times before, but never found any with 10% speed increase, ED, undispelity and 7d8 sneak attacks.

* Note I have not put any domains it.



Cleric(24), Rogue(13), Monk(3), Human

STR: 9
DEX: 17 (26)
CON: 8
WIS: 16 (20)
INT: 14
CHA: 8

Human: (Quick to Master)

22: Monk(2): {Deflect Arrows}
23: Monk(3)
24: Cleric(17): DEX+1, Epic Weapon Focus: Kama, (DEX=21)
25: Cleric(18)
26: Cleric(19)
27: Cleric(20): Epic Prowess
28: Cleric(21): DEX+1, (DEX=22)
29: Cleric(22)

31: Rogue(5)

35: Rogue(9)

37: Rogue(11)

Hitpoints: 254

Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 20/26/27

BAB: 25
AB (max, naked): 37 (melee), 34 (ranged)

Spell Casting: Cleric(9)
Alignment Changes: 0

Concentration 43(42), Disable Trap 12(16), Hide 42(50), Lore 34(36), Move Silently 42(50), Open Lock 22(30), Set Trap 17(27), Spellcraft 30(32), Tumble 40(48), UMD 35(34)

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
This gave me an idea. This build has the same AB, but better AC and saves, and HiPS, and more health. He also gets all the Cleric spells earlier. This comes at the cost of losing the Disable Trap, Search, UMD and Open Lock skills, and Sneak Attack. I also had to lose Extend Spell to get the Dodge and Mobility requirements for SD. In hindsight, your build might be better, but here goes anyway.

EDIT: Oh wait, WoG has that rule where you must take 3 levels of a class the first time you take it, doesn't it? I'll need to adjust the build for that and post it later.

Shadow Saint (Monk 9 / Cleric 26 / Shadowdancer 5)
Human, Any Lawful
Playable 1 - 40, PvM

STR: 10
DEX: 16 (28)
CON: 10
WIS: 16 (20)
INT: 14
CHA: 8
